ADD_ALLOWANCE.label: Add allowance
ADD_ALLOWANCE.description: Add allowance to a user or team

ADD_INVOICE_ITEM.label: Add invoice item
ADD_INVOICE_ITEM.description: Add a charge or credit to a user or team's next invoice

CHANGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE.label: Change account type
CHANGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE.description: Useful when the account type is used for conditions, e.g. resource availability

CHANGE_USER_STATUS.label: Change user status
CHANGE_USER_STATUS.description: Set a userâ€™s status to active or inactive

CREATE_TASK.label: Create a task
CREATE_TASK.description: Create a task for any admin, containing a link to the trigger of the automation

POST_TO_FEED.label: Post to feed
POST_TO_FEED.description: Create a new post on the community feed

SEND_DOC_TO_SIGN.label: Send a document for signing
SEND_DOC_TO_SIGN.description: Have documents digitally signed and stored in the Account panel

SEND_EMAIL.label: Send an email
SEND_EMAIL.description: Send an email to a user, team, or an admin

SEND_MESSAGE.label: Send a message
SEND_MESSAGE.description: Send a message to a user, team, or an admin

notes: Triggers and their variables/default_condition come from workflowAvailableSteps.
Actions and operations are global enums; plus restrictions are from UI utils.
